feat: enhance hero section with larger typography and toko silhouette

- Add Indonesian ruko/toko silhouette behind staff cards
- Toko features: peaked roof, signboard, windows, rolling door
- Enlarge CTA button and paragraph text for balance
- Works consistently on both desktop and mobile

EOF
\)")
